roleset.name: to make a revision on the appearance or function of

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yearly changes in federal benefit laws force small businesses to repeatedly re - evaluate and redesign existing plans .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: But even though by some estimates it might cost the world as much as $ 100 billion between now and the year 2000 to convert to other coolants , foaming agents and solvents and to redesign equipment for these less efficient substitutes , the Montreal Protocol 's legions of supporters say it is worth it .

roleset.note: REDESIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'redesign' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'design'. (from redesign.01-v predicate notes)
